attributes.action: GET DAVID CAMERON TO TRIGGER ARTICLE 50 TO LEAVE THE EUROPEAN UNION IMMEDIATELY
attributes.background: DAVID CAMERON CALLED THE REFERENDUM AND WAS IN FAVOUR OF THE UNITED KINGDOM REMAINING IN THE EUROPEAN UNION. HE LOST. THE BRITISH PUBLIC HAVE SPOKEN AND VOTED TO LEAVE THE EUROPEAN UNION. HE SHOULD RESPECT THEIR DECISION AND TRIGGER ARTICLE 50 NOW. HE SHOULD NOT LEAVE IT TO HIS PREDECESSOR.
